name: gns3-mcp
description: Control and automate GNS3 network labs through Claude with type-safe operations
long_description: Version 0.7.0: NEW - set_connection() now accepts adapter names (e.g., 'eth0', 'GigabitEthernet0/0') in addition to numeric indexes. Responses include both human-readable port names and adapter numbers for clarity. Use port names for better readability when creating links. Version 0.6.5: FIXED - Node actions (start/stop/suspend/reload) now handle empty API responses correctly. Previously failed with 'Expecting value: line 1 column 1 (char 0)' when GNS3 returned HTTP 204 No Content. Version 0.6.4: FIXED - Z-order rendering in topology export now matches GNS3 GUI. Links render below nodes (z=min(nodes)-0.5), drawings/nodes intermixed by z-value using painter's algorithm. Version 0.6.3: FIXED - Font fallback chain for consistent cross-platform rendering. Version 0.6.2: FIXED - Node label positioning in export_topology_diagram() now matches official GNS3 GUI rendering. Version 0.6.1: FIXED - All newlines automatically converted to \r\n (CR+LF) for console compatibility. Version 0.6.0: Added interactive console tools. Version 0.5.0: Port status indicators on topology export. Version 0.3.0: Type-safe Pydantic models, two-phase link validation, performance caching. Supports GNS3 v3 API.
